resources.string: Cabbage is a leafy green, red (purple), or white (pale green) biennial plant. It\'s healthy and you should eat it.
Carrots are usually orange and the word is they are good for your vision since they contain loads of vitamin A.
Grass is always greener on the other side. So plant to make your neighbours envious.
Lettuce is very good for salads. Also very healthy too.
Onions can make you cry so handle with care. If your eyes are sensitive wear swim goggles while chopping.
A path for walking in your garden.
Peppers can come in all sorts of colors including red, yellow, orange and green. Beware of the hot ones.
Plant Tulips in your garden to add extra envy from your neighbours.
